<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Flying Blade Wheel Snare](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3371)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=646" />
<trait label="Snare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=809" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=715" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 298 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Price** 10,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When a creature enters the square, a deadly flying wheel of spinning blades launches at it, making a [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) with an attack modifier of +35 that deals 8d8 slashing damage on a hit. Once on each of your turns, you can use an Interact action within 120 feet of the wheel to cause it to [Fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=2312) up to 60 feet toward the creature it's chasing and make another Strike if it's within 5 feet of its target after it moves. After 1 minute, the spinning ceases, and the wheel falls to the ground. Creatures can destroy the wheel to stop it (AC 37, Fort +29, Ref +20, Hardness 10, HP 200, object immunities).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Flying Blade Wheel Snare
